column.name: description
column.value: Users assigned to the {0} role have full access to the gateway.

changeSet.author: gateway
changeSet.comment: Assign Administrator role to existing admin user

column.name: description
column.value: Users assigned to the {0} role have read only access to the gateway.

changeSet.author: gateway
changeSet.comment: Create the Manage Internal Users and Groups role

column.name: name
column.value: Manage Internal Users and Groups

column.name: description
column.value: Users assigned to the {0} role have the ability to create, read, update and delete users and groups in the internal identity provider.

changeSet.author: gateway
changeSet.comment: Create the Publish External Identity Providers role

column.name: name
column.value: Publish External Identity Providers

column.name: description
column.value: Users assigned to the {0} role have the ability to create new external identity providers.

column.name: name
column.value: Search Users and Groups

column.name: description
column.value: Users assigned to the {0} role have permission to search and view users and groups in all identity providers.

column.name: name
column.value: Publish Webservices

column.name: description
column.value: Users assigned to the {0} role have the ability to publish new web services.

column.name: name
column.value: Manage Webservices

column.name: description
column.value: Users assigned to the {0} role have the ability to publish new services and edit existing ones.

column.name: name
column.value: View Audit Records

column.name: description
column.value: Users assigned to the {0} role have the ability to view audits in the manager.

column.name: name
column.value: View Service Metrics

column.name: description
column.value: Users assigned to the {0} role have the ability to monitor service metrics in the manager.

column.name: name
column.value: Manage Cluster Status

column.name: description
column.value: Users assigned to the {0} role have the ability to read, create, update and delete cluster status information.

column.name: name
column.value: Manage Certificates (truststore)

column.name: description
column.value: Users assigned to the {0} role have the ability to read, create, update and delete trusted certificates and policies for revocation checking.

column.name: name
column.value: Manage Message Destinations

column.name: description
column.value: Users assigned to the {0} role have the ability to read, create, update and delete message destinations.

column.name: name
column.value: Manage Cluster Properties

column.name: description
column.value: Users assigned to the {0} role have the ability to read, create, update and delete cluster properties.

column.name: name
column.value: Manage Listen Ports

column.name: description
column.value: Users assigned to the {0} role have the ability to read, create, update and delete Gateway listen ports (HTTP(S) and FTP(S)) and to list published services.

column.name: name
column.value: Manage Log Sinks

column.name: description
column.value: Users assigned to the {0} role have the ability to read, create, update and delete log sinks.

column.name: name
column.value: Gateway Maintenance

column.name: description
column.value: Users assigned to the {0} role have the ability to perform Gateway maintenance tasks.

column.name: name
column.value: Manage Email Listeners

column.name: description
column.value: Users assigned to the {0} role have the ability to read, create, update and delete email listeners.

column.name: name
column.value: Manage JDBC Connections

column.name: description
column.value: Users assigned to the {0} role have the ability to read, create, update and delete JDBC connections.

column.name: name
column.value: Manage UDDI Registries

column.name: description
column.value: Users assigned to the {0} role have the ability to read, create, update and delete UDDI Registry connections.

column.name: name
column.value: Manage Secure Passwords

column.name: description
column.value: Users assigned to the {0} role have the ability to read, create, update and delete any stored password.

column.name: name
column.value: Manage Private Keys

column.name: description
column.value: Users in this role have the ability to read, create, update, and delete private keys, as well as the ability to change the designated special-purpose keys (eg, the SSL or CA key).

column.name: name
column.value: Manage Password Policies

column.name: description
column.value: Users assigned to the {0} role have the ability to read and update any stored password policy and view the identity providers.

column.name: name
column.value: Invoke Audit Viewer Policy

column.name: description
column.value: Allow the INTERNAL audit-viewer policy to be invoked for an audited message (request / response or detail)

column.name: other_operation
column.value: audit-viewer policy

column.name: name
column.value: Manage Administrative Accounts Configuration

column.name: description
column.value: Users assigned to the {0} role have the ability to create/read/update cluster properties applicable to administrative accounts configurations.

column.name: name
column.value: View ssg Log Sink (#-1,300)

column.name: description
column.value: Users assigned to the {0} role have the ability to read the log sink and any associated log files.

column.name: name
column.value: Manage Encapsulated Assertions

column.name: description
column.value: Users assigned to the {0} role have the ability to create/read/update/delete encapsulated assertions.

column.name: value
column.value: Included Policy Fragment

column.name: name
column.value: Manage Custom Key Value Store

column.name: description
column.value: Users assigned to the {0} role have the ability to read, create, update, and delete key values from custom key value store.

column.name: name
column.value: Manage Firewall Rules

column.name: description
column.value: Users assigned to the {0} role have the ability to read, create, update and delete Firewall rules.

column.name: name
column.value: Manage SiteMinder Configuration

column.name: description
column.value: Users assigned to the {0} role have the ability to read, create, update and delete SiteMinder configuration.
